original: 琅琊郡臨沂人，東漢末年荊州刺史。於討董期間，因曹寅假傳檄文之故；又或孫堅刻意為之，冤死於孫堅之手。之後東漢朝廷指派劉表為荊州牧。
text: Linyi, Langya County, Jingzhou governor in the late Eastern Han Dynasty. During the period of seeking Dong, because of Cao Yin's false biography, or Sun Jian deliberately, he died unjustly at the hands of Sun Jian. After the Eastern Han Dynasty court appointed Liu Biao as Jingzhou Mu.
